title: mAnuSa janma
sahitya:
mAnuSa janma durbalavidu jAnakIshana krpeyili bandide 
hIna buddhi mADi nInu hAni mADi koLLa bEDa


caraNam 1    bhakta paaGaDeyADi nInu vyarttakAla kaLiyabEDa 
antagana dUtarige Enu karuNa illavayya
    caraNam 2    sAdhu sajjana sangava mADi vEda shAstravanna nODi 
mOdadindadali vEdagamyana pAda pankaja dhyAnisO
    caraNam 3    hariya smaraNe mAtradinda ghOra duritavella nAsha 
parama padava koDuva namma guru purandara viTTalA
